mapper.update: update organization set labels = json_array_append(labels, '$', #{label}) where id = #{id} and not #{label} member of(labels->'$')
update organization set labels = json_remove(labels, replace(json_search(labels, 'one', #{label}), '"', '')) where id = #{id} and #{label} member of(labels->'$')
mapper.delete: update organization set labels = json_remove(labels, replace(json_search(labels, 'one', #{label}), '"', '')) where #{label} member of(labels->'$')
